subject: Re: [junit] Hoping for Release of 4.11
msgSnippet: Hi ralthor, I am currently waiting for 4.11, too, because of named Parameterized Tests. I took a snapshot of JUnit and uploaded it into our Nexus. So I was
messageBody:
Hi ralthor,

I am currently waiting for 4.11, too, because of named Parameterized
Tests.
I took a snapshot of JUnit and uploaded it into our Nexus. So I was
able to have named tests before the release. I didn't have any problems
with my current tests, so try it.

Kind regards,
Philip
